text: The Academy Award for Best Actress is awarded for best performance by an actress in a leading role in a movie. The award is presented by the Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences. == Winners == Winners are listed first in colored row, followed by the other nominees. ===1920s=== Year Actress Film
